creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Seat cover, seamed up the center, of rose-colored cut velvet with a design of lotus blossoms, clouds and bats. One large lotus in a shaped quatre-foil medallion in central panel; bats and clouds fill corners of panel. Running loyus design in main and boxed borders. Lining of rose-red silk of cloud design. A mate to 42.8.250. Both covers appear to have been cleaned.
title: Seat Cover
